message: A familiar voice reaches me through the fog of pain.

name: ベニ
message: "If it ain't Aoba! And Ren, too! Hey, Koujaku, go get 'em!"

name: 紅雀
message: "You okay?! Hey! Snap out of it!"
Someone picks me up. The haze lifts slightly, and I make out Koujaku's face.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Kou... Ergh..."
I try to say his name, but just then, the nausea surges back at full force.
I frantically cover my mouth, but it's too late.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Blargh!"

name: 女性客Ａ
message: "Ewww! Hey!"

name: 男性客Ａ
message: "He just puked!"
Fuuuuck...

I can't believe that just happened.

It wasn't just the contents of my stomach I expelled, but whatever shred of dignity I had left.
Groans and shrieks go up all around me. I just want to die.

I wipe my mouth with the back of my hand and finally lift my head.

Koujaku's kimono, I realize, was right in the splash zone.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sor... Koujaku... your kimono..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't be stupid."
Koujaku gently strokes my head.

name: 紅雀
message: "It's no big deal. Just calm down."
His tone is surprisingly soft as he wipes my mouth with his sleeve.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! It'll get dirty!"
Startled by the gesture, I try to push his arm away, but he just holds my shoulders tighter and wipes my mouth anyway.
I can't believe it. I ruined the sleeve of his pretty red kimono...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wh-What are you doing?!"

name: 紅雀
message: "You sure are whining a lot for someone who just passed out. Just shut up, will you? Can you stand?"
